title: Resource
description: Resource represents any resource, physical or digital, that is related to the described dataset.

type.title: Type
type.description: A description of the resource. Gets the value from controlled list https://datacite-metadata-schema.readthedocs.io/en/4.6/appendices/appendix-1/resourceTypeGeneral/.

relationType.title: Relation type
relationType.description: Type of the relation between Dataset and related resource.

resource_url.title: Resource URL
resource_url.description: Resolvable URL representing the resource, preferably human readable.

qualified_relation.title: qualified relation
qualified_relation.description: Attachment of resource to the relationship.
